p: The limitations of our study include: (1) potential bias in selecting study subjects to complete questionnaires, (2) no study participants had any experience with a “real life” global pandemic emergencies, (3) insufficiently representative sample of respondents, (4) the timing of the study (the research was conducted in first phase, but the COVID-19 pandemic is still ongoing, and this may also have an impact on the study), (5) in particular the mental state of the respondents due to the overall situation etc.
